pbcoreIdentifier.source: WITNESS Media Archive Partner Title ID

pbcoreDescriptionDocument.pbcoreDescription: Interview with Otto Saki, a lawyer at Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights where he coordinates urgent appeals to African human rights systems and the United Nations and is responsible for international litigation and human rights defenders? duties. Saki discusses the origins of ZLHR, his childhood, and his activism and advocacy .
